p: Following this observation, our approach was to think about a new substances that could have, in vitro, the same antibacterial effect as that of ATBs, while having the advantage of avoiding the selection of new resistant bacteria, which is why, we thought to an ancient cure, namely aromatic plants and especially their EOs [ 9]. Our approach was, therefore, to look for the antibacterial action of these EO to remedy the evolution of antimicrobial resistance, thus providing consumers with healthy foodstuffs.
